Murdoch quits some News Corp. boards

Media mogul Rupert Murdoch stepped down this past week as a director of a number of News Corp. subsidiary boards in Britain and the United States, a spokeswoman for News Corp.’s British arm confirmed. (AP)

Man detained over fake explosives

Police detained an iRobot Corp. salesman on an inbound flight to Logan International Airport today after he left replica explosives in a rental car in New Jersey. (Globe)

Spencer child treated for rabies

After a 10-year-old girl was bitten by a bat Tuesday afternoon in Spencer, authorities fear more children may be in danger. (Boston Globe )
